name: Blast Cubes (Unfinished)
description:
Blast Cubes is a Local Multiplayer game for 4 players. Where when a player dies it becomes a platform.

  • Easy and fun gameplay elements.
  • Beautiful pixel art.
  • 2 to 4 players on the same screen.
  • Several arenas with unique gameplay elements.
  • Three different game modes.
  • Xbox and PS4 controllers support.
  • 4 players on the same keyboard.
